title: Why can't I see previous booking details? : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: Ticket Booking Queries : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
We have answers to all your queries!
'Your Orders' will show up to 20 transactions which is up to 20 bookings of the last 6 months.
In case you have transacted recently and are unable to locate your tickets under 'Your Orders' section, simply log out of the app/website and login again using the contact details used at the time of booking and you should be good to go.
